document_data.name: Trent
document_data.mainbody: '''Trent Vendall''' was a visitor to [[Neverwinter]] in the 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.History: Trent came from [[Cormyr]] and went to Neverwinter, despite bandits attacking the caravans. He managed to arrive in Neverwinter. He offered the [[Kalach-Cha]] some alcohol, if he worked with the Watchmen.
